captions.text:
- WE ARE BACK WITH KEVIN HART,
AND WE ARE PLAYING JENGA.
AND YOU SAID DURING THE BREAK

THAT YOU HEARD
THAT I WAS A CHEATER.

- I DID HEAR THAT.
- NO, I AM NOT--

- I AM COMPETITIVE,
BUT I WILL NEVER CHEAT.

TAKE GAMES LIKE THIS
VERY SERIOUS, OKAY?

- WELL, THEN CONSIDER ME BLACK,
'CAUSE I--

- I FEEL THE SAME WAY.
- ALL RIGHT, OKAY.

THIS NEEDS TO BE
LIKE A SPEED JENGA,

- YOU WANT TO GO FIRST?
- I'LL GO FIRST.

- ONE HAND.
- ONE HAND. I'LL GO FIRST.

STRATEGY TO MY JENGA.
- ALL RIGHT.
PUT YOUR PIECE ON THE TOP.

WHY Y'ALL CLAP?
THAT WAS SHAKING LIKE CRAZY.

EVERYBODY KNOWS,
DON'T GO TO THE BOTTOM.
OKAY, AT A CERTAIN POINT, GUYS,

I'M GONNA NEED A STOOL TO PUT
THE PIECES BACK UP ON TOP.

- NO.
WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT?
DO YOU WANT TO END THE GAME?

- THERE'S A STRATEGY
TO THIS GAME.

I GOT TO--
I GOT TO PULL IT OUT,
I SHOULDN'T HAVE DID THIS PIECE.

- WELL, THERE'S NO WAY
IT'S GONNA STAY LIKE THAT.

- ELLEN, DO NOT--
DO NOT TALK

WHILE I'M DOING MY PIECE
RIGHT NOW.

- IT DOESN'T MATTER
HOW SLOWLY YOU GO.

- YES, IT DOES.
- IT IS GONNA--

- IF I GET THIS PIECE
TO GO BACK SOME--

"ABOUT LAST NIGHT"
IS IN THEATERS THIS FRIDAY.

title: Kevin Hart and Ellen Play Jenga
